body:
Write 1-3 lines continuing the Pokemon battle. Try and stay close to the original Pokemon battle lines as shown in the game, but be as creative as possible.
I'll start.

Owner IvyCode challenges you to a battle!
Owner IvyCode sends out Howsie22!
Go, AviGill!

title: [Forum Game] Pokemon Battle

replies.body:
AviGill >Fight
Avigill uses Admin Abuse.
It was super Effective!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
AviGill>Bag
Pokeball, *Throws Master Ball*
Congratulations, You have caught a Howsie22!

replies.body:
ViolentBoo Used Sun Stab on WhorenetJumper.

It wasn't very effective because he was already dead.

Because I killed him

Forever.
